entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
